short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Balances sound levels between YouTube videos and ads, and reduces sudden high noises.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Sound Equalizer - Smooth & Balanced Audio Experience
Are you tired of sudden loud noises or jarring sound differences between YouTube videos and ads? The YouTube Sound Equalizer is here to enhance your listening experience, offering seamless, balanced audio for both YouTube videos and ads.

Key Features:
Automatic Sound Leveling: Balances the volume between videos and ads, so you never get startled by sudden loud sounds.
Noise Reduction: Reduces distracting background noises, ensuring clearer, more enjoyable audio playback.
Loudness Control: Lowers extreme sounds like explosions, screams, or car horns, preventing unpleasant surprises.
Real-Time Equalization: Adjusts sound levels in real-time for smoother transitions and consistent audio across content.
User-Friendly: Once installed, the equalizer runs automatically whenever you watch YouTube, with no manual setup required.
With its sleek, modern interface and cutting-edge audio management features, YouTube Sound Equalizer ensures an optimized listening experience for all types of content—whether it’s your favorite music video or a video ad. Enjoy the sound clarity and balance you deserve!

Why Choose YouTube Sound Equalizer?
No More Volume Jumps: Whether watching videos or ads, this extension ensures consistent audio.
Simple, Clean Interface: Runs automatically in the background, with visual feedback showing when it's active.
Perfect for Any Content: Whether it's quiet dialogue or sudden action scenes, the extension smooths the audio for an optimal experience.
Install YouTube Sound Equalizer today and make your YouTube watching more enjoyable with balanced, smooth sound—no more surprises!
